attributes.action: We say No to National ID Cards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The goverment is trying to chip people with this mark 666. By having these id cards. We say no.

We will not be subject to you satan experiment for your new world order that you are trying to take place. With your one world goverment under the united nations all country are put into one.

That is what they are trying to do. We will not allow the UN or EU to abuse human rights like they think that they can get away by the earthly world order.

Jesus is coming back and he is the son of God and he isn't dead he is alive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
